   contain the root `toctree` directive.

Orange County Lettings Documentation
===================================

**Welcome to the official documentation for the Orange County Lettings platform.**

This guide provides all the necessary information to install, configure, deploy, and maintain the OC Lettings application. Whether you are a developer, administrator, or end user, you will find clear and concise instructions to help you get started and ensure smooth operation.

Key topics covered include:

- **Project Overview:** Understand the purpose and main features of the application.
- **Installation Guide:** Step-by-step instructions for setting up the project locally or in production.
- **Deployment:** Best practices and detailed procedures for automated and manual deployment using Docker, GitHub Actions, and Render.
- **Configuration:** How to manage environment variables, secrets, and settings for different environments.
- **Monitoring and Maintenance:** Accessing logs, error tracking, and performing rollbacks.
- **Technical Reference:** Details on the technology stack, database models, and API interfaces.

For further details, refer to the relevant sections in this documentation. If you encounter any issues or have questions, please consult the FAQ or contact the project maintainers.

.. note::
   This documentation is regularly updated. Make sure to check for the latest information and best practices.

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 1

   description
   installation
   quickstart
   technologies
   database
   interfaces
   deployment
